entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement code mapper #69967
  • Tracking issue to ensure any mitigations we make for out of sync source-generators get removed. #69964
  • Overload resolution doesn't work with collection expressions #69962
  • StructLayout And MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.ByValArray)Memory layout error when using two attributes simultaneously #69960

Closed

  • High CPU Utilization with Very Basic Keypresses #66410
    17.6
  • Collection literal with custom types not working #69950

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for collection expressions in attributes #69968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Add mitigation in 17.7 for cases where local and remote host disagree on source generated files. #69965
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForServicing
  • Add inline parameter hints keywords to VSPackage.resx #69963
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Speicfy System.Private.Uri and System.Net.Http versions #69959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Dev/toddgrun/revert 769dfa13624dae1bbba1afbdfaeb85f928843004 and use multi dictionary pool #69896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Replace InterceptorsPreview with InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces=global #69848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Temp fix to bring vsmac package #69966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Refactoring of synthesized types tracking across EnC generations #69782
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Do source-generation only in our OOP process. #69917
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include a bit in DocumentId to indicate if it corresponds to a SG document or not #69952
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add new endpoint in roslyn to get token for multiple ranges #69946
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Check constructor for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Create a brokered service to delegate loading of projects to us #69857
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Parameter and property analysis #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • EnC: Generate correct state mapping for methods containing await foreach #69806
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Remove unnecessary feeds #69928
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Perform a null check for a pattern-based fixed statement over nullable value type. #69957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use no-op global assembly cache helper when running under .net core #69936
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make ManagedToolTask.PathToManagedTool virtual #69958
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
